attributes.action: restore back to the Home Secretary the powers to impose whole life tariffs upon prisoners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whole life tarriffs need to be reintroduced as they provide the only signifcant deterrent to very dangerous prisoners and provide public safety as these prisoners will never be released.

I believe in this time of heightened terrorist threats and plots, not mentioning continous heinous paedophlia and serial murderers, the situation demands that stern action is taken now to make sure no very dangerous offenders are released to create mayhem and destruction ever again.
